name: Customers Balance
query:
SELECT 
  customers as "CIF:Data",
  full_name as "Customers Name:Data/Customers Name:220",
  ao_name as "Advisor:Data/Advisor:130",
  join_date as "Join Date",
  sum(debit) as "Debit:Currency/Debit:120",
  sum(credit) as "Credit:Currency/Credit:120",
  sum(debit -credit) as "Saldo:Currency/Saldo:120",
  sum(case when (month(join_date+interval 3 month) and time_periode = "3 Month") then (debit*0.5/100) else 0 end) as "3 Month:Currency/3 Month:100", 
  sum(case when (month(join_date+interval 6 month) and time_periode = "6 Month") then (debit*1/100) else 0 end) as "6 Month:Currency/6 Month:100",
  sum(case when (month(join_date+interval 9 month) and time_periode = "9 Month") then (debit*1.5/100) else 0 end) as "9 Month:Currency/9 Month:100",
  sum(case when (month(join_date+interval 12 month)and time_periode = "12 Month") then (debit*2/100) else 0 end) as "12 Month:Currency/12 Month:100" 
FROM `tabTransaction`
group by customers
